title.en: Gin v1.10.0 Released with Performance Improvements
title.zh: Gin v1.10.0 发布，性能优化显著

summary.en: The latest Gin framework release brings significant performance improvements and new middleware options for better request handling.
summary.zh: 最新的 Gin 框架版本带来了显著的性能提升和新的中间件选项，提供更好的请求处理能力。

title.en: Rust 1.75 Introduces Async fn in Traits
title.zh: Rust 1.75 引入 Trait 中的异步函数

summary.en: Rust 1.75 stable release introduces async fn in traits, a highly anticipated feature for async programming.
summary.zh: Rust 1.75 稳定版引入了 Trait 中的异步函数，这是异步编程期待已久的特性。

summary.en: Critical security patches released for PostgreSQL addressing multiple vulnerabilities.
summary.zh: PostgreSQL 发布关键安全补丁，修复多个漏洞。

summary.en: The GraphQL Foundation announced the 2024 roadmap focusing on improved tooling and developer experience.
summary.zh: GraphQL 基金会发布 2024 路线图，重点关注改进工具和开发者体验。

summary.en: Redis 7.2 brings massive performance improvements with optimized memory management and faster data structures.
summary.zh: Redis 7.2 通过优化内存管理和更快的数据结构带来了巨大的性能提升。
